There is no flaw in it, and it is probably the most clean and friendly oud perfume I have smelled to date.<br />
<br />
However, it is way overpriced. I wish Penhaligon's execs would be more reasonable and consistent with their pricing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2215154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2215154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My favorite from penhaligons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2209872"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2209872#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2209664" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AEyup"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AEyup" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2209664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2209664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277825">AEyup</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 01:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Exotic middle eastern woody scent, captivating when smelled for the first time.<br />
Yes oud, rose and leather is the main theme but still fresh, airy and green somehow, suitable for hot weather.    <br />
Poor longevity, most of the times gone within the first hour, do not last on clothes either.  <br />
<br />
Chopard's Oud Malaki is a good alternative - smell wise almost identical, but same issue with performance! I use both for running errands and daily quick use.  <br />
<br />
Halfeti is not worth the price tag if you ask me.<br />
Just get Oud Malaki which even gets an extra point for originality - it was released before.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2209664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2209664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203673" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ADB1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324306"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1324306.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ADB1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sphinx-Fragrances/Sphinx-Elixir-79827.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79827.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sphinx Elixir"title="Sphinx Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324306">ADB1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-30">06/30/24 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious. My signature at the moment. Wish it lasted a little longer. Oud Malaki by Chopard is nearly identical and less than half the price, although Oud Malaki has a less clean opening and you have to wait for the dry down. I wouldn't buy this at full price but if you catch one of Penhaligons summer sales then it can be worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2203673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2203673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199821" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="odinson888"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1920098"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1920098.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="odinson888" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2199821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2199821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190372" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr. Bear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1912264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1912264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr. Bear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Le-Gemme-Orom-72618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Gemme Orom"title="Le Gemme Orom"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1912264">Mr. Bear</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-16">06/16/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like halfeti, but the drydown gets a bit too sour for me.  Great performance though!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2190372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2190372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2189095" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ZuLemke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958190"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ZuLemke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2189095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2189095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958190">ZuLemke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I only just got through a 1mL sample of this, and will be purchasing a decant soon. Take my review with a grain of salt. <br />
<br />
This fragrance smells exquisite. I cannot pick out a single goddamn note listed on the fragrance it is so freaking well blended. It smells luxourious. I keep sniffing my wrists while wearing this. <br />
<br />
It's fresh, it's warm, it's exotic, it's bold, it's refined, it's sublte, it's classy. <br />
<br />
This fragrance is what I imagine a high end resort in Cairo smelling like. And well, I find the scent somewhat addictive. <br />
<br />
As far as longevity goes, it does last around 8 hours for me. The first 4 hours or so, I can smell wafts of the fragrance as I move about my day, after that, it becomes a bit more of a skin scent lasting another 4-6 hours. <br />
<br />
To my nose, the scent is fairly linear, but in this case, it's a good thing. I just really enjoy the scent. I have only worn it in summer so far, and I think it works really well in that season. I see the reviews mentioning it as a winter fall scent, so I can only imagine how it will be during those months, but I truly think this is a year-round signature-scent worthy pick.<br />
<br />
That all said, some reviewers are claiming that this is a pretty common scent profile from other arab perfumes, so I might need to look into those before commiting to a bottle of this.. But hot damn do I love this stuff from my first impressions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2189095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2189095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182770" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marta_Regina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1934803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marta_Regina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934803">Marta_Regina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-09">06/09/24 04:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, herbal, and characterful opening with power. Slightly leans towards the masculine side, but citrus, warm oriental notes make it more unisex. It reminds me of a woman dressed in a power look, with a blazer that adds strength and energy. It dries down fairly quickly, leaving a subtle oriental-herbal-spicy veil intimately close to the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2182770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2182770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164901" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164901" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="duzmantic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/710544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.710544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="duzmantic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/B683-Extrait-64653.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64653.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt=" B683 Extrait"title=" B683 Extrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164901ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164901" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/710544">duzmantic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 22:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought the Halfeti gift set, which cost me an arm and a leg. It included the perfume and oil. Even when I apply both, the performance is very weak. The longevity is weak on skin and even on clothes, and the sillage is atrocious.<br />
<br />
This scent profile is quite common in the Middle East. So, I recommend you get one of the well-blend Arab clones that offer better performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2164901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2164901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163061" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163061" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lostnose2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lostnose2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163061ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163061" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834">lostnose2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-21">05/21/24 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The intriguing black rose. I really enjoy this fragrance. Has many great facets like leather and oud. Along with being resinous. Yet, that rose shines. One of my favorites from the house. I would consider it as a daily wear. Comforting,  confident, and complex. Love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2163061"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2163061#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162026" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2157212" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BinkyBarnes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2128401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2128401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BinkyBarnes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2157212ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2157212" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2128401">BinkyBarnes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 15:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You can expect this to smell pretty much as how it is described. It's quite a strong fragrance, with the resinous, cypress leaf notes at the forefront. I got a sample of this fragrance as I was looking for oud scents, and the oud lingers in the background. Think of incense. It's not unique, and smells like a common gulf-Arab fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2157212"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2157212#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145871" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The_Scentennial"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901642"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="The_Scentennial" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Parfum-75126.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75126.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Parfum"title="Armani Code Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901642">The_Scentennial</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 16:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After fragrance influencers like School of Scent hyped the hell out of this fragrance, i was eager to sample this in store at some point. I finally got that chance today. Saying it was a disappointment was an understatement, and to make things worse the price is wild. This thing smells almost exactly like the aftershave or spray your barber applies. The Cyprus and citrus combination is probably to be  most blamed for that. I imagine this would get cloying in the summer heat as a result, and this doesn’t really feel like a winter scent either. So I’m lost on what people find so great about this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2145871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2145871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115646">mumenlara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 11:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>With a medicinal and woody aroma and a robust sillage, this fragrance is unmistakably unisex. I'm puzzled as to why it's marketed for femail!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2141269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2141269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2140812" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ziva99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ziva99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2140812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2140812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898768">Ziva99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 02:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I HATE this as much as I hate Empressa EDP. I’m not good at Provenzano‘s production.<br />
<br />
I think this is more suitable for men. <br />
<br />
I love Constantinople, Lothair, Endymion, Endymion Concentré, Opus 1870 and etc., BUT not this one, Empressa and Helen. <br />
It is not the perfume’s fault, just the mismatching of the taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2140812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2140812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131264" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DBlack47"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1564641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DBlack47" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Sport-2021-71326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Sport 2021"title="Dior Homme Sport 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641">DBlack47</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 04:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligons Halfeti is an absolute gem! I remember this being my first niche fragrance and always loved it. Definitely unisex with its initial burst of saffron and nutmeg off the top, combined with bergamot and cardamom. It dries down to a rose, cedar and tonka, with a beautiful Oud note and minimal leather. <br />
<br />
The longevity on this scent is easily 12 hours, with massive projection and a huge amount of sillage, it’s so good!!<br />
Personal opinion: dress up for this, chinos, pastel shirt and sports jacket, fall/winter/spring! <br />
<br />
Rating: 5/5<br />
Recommendation: Must have</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2131264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2131264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128476" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="takefivespiegel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2057035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="takefivespiegel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128476ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128476" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057035">takefivespiegel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 09:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My absolute favourite fragrance of all time, it's THE fragrance that got me into collecting. The perfect combination of oud, rose and other florals with a fresh spicy opening. The best of the best.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2128476"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2128476#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123314" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 02:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good one… Halfeti seems to be the best performing and most complex scent from Penhaligons from what I’ve tried so far. Not my most favourite scent profile, but it’s strong, multilayered and packs a punch.<br />
<br />
I am not sure if it’s something I would want to be smelling like, but for a men this scent would do wonders! <br />
Halfeti is first and foremost a great blend of oud, cypress, cedar, leather, saffron, vanilla with hints of florals, citruses, spices, tonka beans and aromatic herbs.<br />
<br />
I love how smooth, balanced and vibrant smells. Has a very addictive quality and leaves a intoxicating trail behind when I move. My husband loves Halfeti… It’s one of those few fragrances that features predominantly the notes of oud and leather that I personally don’t feel like it smells bad. I would not purchase a bottle of Penhaligons with my own money for my collection, but if I would get it gifted, I would wear Halfeti. <br />
<br />
More fall and winter appropriate and more masculine leaning. But if the combo of oud and leather is your thing, I see a woman rocking this because it’s not exclusively or entirely a masculine scent. I get here and there some jasmine and rose whiffs, plus some sweetness from tonka beans, vanilla and the citruses in the opening.<br />
<br />
For the quality of the scent, the performance and the packaging, Halfeti is fairly priced in my opinion. Penhaligons is not a cheap brand by any means, but some of their fragrances last like an EDT. Halfeti lasts for an entire day and projects heavily for the first few hours. It smells and performs like an expensive perfume!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2123314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2123314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2121802" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Antoshka2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Antoshka2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Shaghaf-Oud-50582.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50582.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shaghaf Oud"title="Shaghaf Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2121802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2121802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660">Antoshka2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-11">04/11/24 15:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not at all what I expected after first smelling Blenheim Bouquet. This is a sexy fragrance. Warm rich and spicy. Unisex but not too feminine. Suitable for all occasions and seasons, even work if you only wear a small amount. Inoffensive but somewhat strong. Lasts a long long time too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2121802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2121802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Very nice</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2120291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2120291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937">Chesf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The most famous penhaligon's somehow smells most generic and slightly excessive to me.  Nonetheless atmospheric and non-threatening<br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2115349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2115349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2096947" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chaosepher"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1758544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chaosepher" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-13015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme"title="Dior Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2096947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2096947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758544">chaosepher</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 23:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After my one and only fragrance of childhood which subtlety paved my way to finding magic in scents I had a big hiatus of not really wearing fragrances.<br />
<br />
I always kept my special interest in scents and enjoyed the burning of incense to dive into the unspeakable world the scents can evoke<br />
However the heavy use of incense was not a easy thing to due due to various considerations. <br />
<br />
One day I came across Halfeti and I was blown away by it. I have been wearing it for couple of years now. Even though I have experience many other fragrances in many classes this still captivates me.<br />
<br />
Sniffing my wrist as I am writing this, I am glad to say...I still cant really say ''what'' I am smelling.<br />
If i was pressed I would say; Rose, and luxury.....<br />
As I sat down to write this i realized that what intrigued me about this is that in some hidden way this really captures the aura of incense. Not the smoke, or the enveloping  cloak of scent, nor the specific aroma which various incense sticks or resins have...<br />
<br />
It captures the introspective and luxurious nature that incense brings to a space when it is intentionally burned and dedicated to a "higher" purpose. (not just as a ''air freshener / camouflager or routine'' )<br />
<br />
So, Rose, incense, light smokiness, and a sort of ethereal layer of warm spices. I feel that the blending is so nice that it just morphs into more than the sum of its parts, this also reacts beautifully to temperature/ skin and clothes and reveals nice subtle differences and accents.<br />
<br />
I know that this will not really  inform anyone of the "notes" or what it smells like. Yet I am happy that after this time it is still as abstract to me as it was the first time I smelled it and I hope it will remain an enigma for many years to come so it remains interesting and mysterious every time I use it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2096947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2096947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2088764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2088764" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chloerose666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1950146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chloerose666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Remember-Me-49435.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49435.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Remember Me"title="Remember Me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2088764ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2088764" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950146">Chloerose666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-11">03/11/24 02:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Voted as more masc but as a woman I love wearing this. It's another 10/10 for me along with Hacivat (by Nishane)<br />
<br />
Lovely and spicy, extremely fragrant, masc leaning. Dries down into the most gorgeous warm woody subtle vanilla (not gourmand in any way though). Excellent sillage and longevity (YAY finally an expensive perfume that actually performs well!! shocker!). I have a small amount left in my sample and I dont want to use it haha! <br />
<br />
This is FB worthy and I hope to get one at the start of autumn here in the UK. I do think its versatile and wearable year round but definitely more suited to cooler weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2088764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2088764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084057" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853752">mmiamuse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 08:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this with my recent Penhaligon's purchase. This is too masculine for my nose. I can see myself smelling this on a well put together older man (50+) in passing. It's extremely heavy and makes me think of Mr. Big from Sex and the City (I imagine this a fragrance he'd wear). For a more youthful twist on this scent profile, try Mr. Sam from the portraits collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2084057"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2084057#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081514" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2077497" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marson70"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110011"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1110011.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marson70" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Tabarome-470.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.470.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tabarome"title="Tabarome"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2077497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2077497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110011">Marson70</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 23:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Today I bought Halfeti, despite the high price... Upon opening it, I smelled it from the bottle, and fell in love with it straight away ! On my skin and with my chemistry, it even smells better !  You don't need too many sprays, as it is very potent fragrance ! The notes have been selected in such a  beautiful way, exactly what makes this fragrance a truly masterpiece ! You can smell middle-eastern influence, but not too much ! Also very herbal, subtle oud and sandalwood ! I love it ! From this house I already own Opus 1870, and I love it. This one is completely different fragrance ! My opinion "blind buy is safe" and it could be wearable, all year round !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2077497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2077497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068720" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kustomeyez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1528791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kustomeyez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Elixir-71708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Elixir"title="1 Million Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791">Kustomeyez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>…. I have the blazing mr Sam and yes this is similar indeed, a little more herbal feeling this one compared to Mr Sam,.. And I gotta say, if you’re basing your review from a small tester then yes , this Will Not Last long from a little tiny spritz, or even the whole dang tester. Unless you unload the entire tester inside one elbow crease or at least little more than half of the tester, in one spot,.. then yeah it’s gonna fade fast. I prefer Mr Sam to this. The new 1 million Golden oud supposedly resembles This Halfeti,… but I have a feeling I’mma like it better than Halfeti. I also prefer Cairo and terrible Teddy over Halfeti. . It’s nice but.. 🤷🏼♂️ IDK but…  I certainly won’t write it off as bad , I do want to test it some more preferably from a full bottle . It’s aight for now</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2068720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2068720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068208" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068208" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CynicalPink"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924789"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1924789.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CynicalPink" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Book-50618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Book"title="Book"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068208ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068208" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924789">CynicalPink</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 08:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My nose is too amateur to pick up the different notes, but after a few hours of wear, I think it’s the cedar that’s standing out the most on my skin. Labeling this one as unisex, though it leans slightly more masculine. I don’t get the Middle Eastern vibe mentioned by others, but it does remind me the colognes I’ve smelled on older Italian relatives.<br />
<br />
To my surprise, it’s the first fragrance I’ve worn in my short journey that has earned me compliments from others (not just one, but several — three from people in my office, and one friend during a quick car ride).<br />
<br />
Edit: After four hours, I can’t smell it on my skin at all. Definitely remains heavy on my sweater, though. (Used four sprays total; one for each wrist, then one at each shoulder of my sweater).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2068208"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2068208#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066790" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066790" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="A Pioneer w/o a Frontier"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="A Pioneer w/o a Frontier" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066790ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066790" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464392">A Pioneer w/o a Frontier</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 00:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Suffocating, cloying and with its monstrous sillage and performance downright offensive too to wear in office or other closed spaces. Very male and very mature, and not unisex at all in my opinion, and this comes from a woman who wears men's perfumes regularly. <br />
<br />
The opening hits you like a ton of bricks, yet with its green cypress it still is the better part of this scent. As it stays it really starts to smell like cheap and very strong Middle Eastern men's perfumes, even if Halfeti is obviously of high quality. It stays forever on your skin. If this is you signature scent, please use it sparingly, it really may give others headache.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2066790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2066790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061914" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061914" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Garion"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868342"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868342.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Garion" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50777.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coach Platinum"title="Coach Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061914ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061914" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868342">Garion</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 07:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried out this and Mr Sam on each wrist today. They're quite close in profile. Spicy, classy, decent performance, quality blends. In the dry down it's quite deep, woody... mysterious? In the opening it's refreshing and spicy. Smells upper class. It makes sense this is one of their most popular scents.<br />
<br />
Projection: 7/10<br />
Longevity: 5/10<br />
Quality: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2061914"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2061914#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
