padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665098">zawwarahmad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>top: masculine, tobacco, woddy, warm, cologne, earthy, natural, pleasant, minty, everyday wear	mid: woody, everyday, warm, spicy, tobacco, cologne, kitchen spice	<br />
base:leather, powdery, stinky	<br />
not bad just not for me, 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2057309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2057309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052587" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052587" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="David_stojan00"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1887891"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1887891.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="David_stojan00" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Afternoon-Swim-53947.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53947.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Afternoon Swim "title="Afternoon Swim "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052587ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052587" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1887891">David_stojan00</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 02:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So halfeti is a very spicy oud, that is blended very good. It screams luxury to me, and i love wearing it. It just lifts my mood. And everyone around me, also love when im wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2052587"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2052587#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047548" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2047548" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="celestial"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1196374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="celestial" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Flower-by-Kenzo-Poppy-Bouquet-Eau-de-Parfum-58624.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58624.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flower by Kenzo Poppy Bouquet Eau de Parfum"title="Flower by Kenzo Poppy Bouquet Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2047548ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2047548" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196374">celestial</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 04:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Halfeti is a high-quality woody, spicy perfume, which smells complex and is very well-blended. I prefer the opening notes and don't particularly appreciate the oud and leather in the dry-down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2047548"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2047548#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2047182" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jacinthes et rubis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1994946"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1994946.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jacinthes et rubis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2047182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2047182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1994946">jacinthes et rubis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I strongly favor Penhaligon and have just today experienced Halfeti for the first time.  Halfeti is a best seller for the house which I believe underscores its seductive allure. Because that is exactly how I felt at first whiff- seduced! I instantly imagined South Asia or the Middle East, a balmy evening, taking in the layers of scent, a luxurious location of some sort, trees, an outdoor fireplace, vivid silks and flowers and incense.  The opening to Halfeti is delicously sensual and lush.  I pick up the saffron and oud right away (although the oud is a base note) and citrus comes through also, giving lightness.  Then the jasmine peeks out, Halfeti's teasing feminine side.  I don't pick up the rose, specifically, but do detect the jasmine in a very subtle mingle with something floral.  The dry down, on my skin, then  translating as a woody/oud amber mixed with incense.  <br />
For reference I am a woman and favor florals, such as Penhaligons Bluebell.<br />
Having said that I honestly did not expect to like Halfeti, and thought it would be too masculine for my taste. But the complex arrangement of notes is gorgeous, and surprisingly not too heavy. <br />
Final notes:  Excellent sillage with two sprays.  Perfect  for a romantic evening, a lavish occasion, all that is lux and decadent.  I will say the masculine elements dominate (in the dry down) the feminine elements, but it still retains its unisex identity and is quite beautifully balanced.  This could be worn and enjoyed by a man or a woman. Would layer beautifully with orange blossom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2047182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2047182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038795" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038795" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samanthalemay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1675364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1675364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samanthalemay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Panda-Edition-2017-45873.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45873.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Panda Edition 2017"title="Panda Edition 2017"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038795ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038795" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1675364">samanthalemay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 14:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heavy winter fragrance. A little goes a long way. Lasts forever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2038795"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2038795#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038024" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Projectcensor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1660881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1660881.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Projectcensor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1660881">Projectcensor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 20:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first Halfeti was a bit too overpowering and smelled like a lot of Arab perfumes I knew and disliked, but then it settled and kind of clicked for me. <br />
<br />
It’s a comfort scent, it smells like an attractive guy with something dark in his past but he’s trying to turn over a new leaf, trying to be softer even though he’s still bitter inside and always will be.<br />
<br />
It also reminds me of CDG’s Floriental and a little like Gucci’s Intense Oud in the things it evokes for me, but both of these scents evoke way nicer associations, Halfeti is lovely but feels a bit more snobby and obnoxious to what I prefer. I wore it to see Saltburn in the cinema and it fits that evil rich person vibe perfectly! Pretty sure the girl beside me had on a Penhaligan’s scent too so I can’t be alone in these thoughts. <br />
<br />
I would recommend sampling it if it sounds like your thing but I wouldn’t recommend anyone to blind buy, Intense Oud and Floriental are better, cheaper (i think) and last longer. <br />
<br />
I give it a 7.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2038024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2038024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037627" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037627" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joeldamien"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="joeldamien" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti"title="Halfeti"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037627ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037627" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824798">joeldamien</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don’t know why no one has said this yet, but for me it smells very similar to Amouage Jubilation DNA. Not the same, but very similar profile. I prefer Jubilation a bit more but this is also a very nice fragrance. Smells aromatic and woody, in a traditional way. I can see this being worn year round, but for summer only night time. I’m shocked at how it can be so old school but also get so many compliments. <br />
<br />
Smells like a clean lumberjack.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2037627"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2037627#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035622" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zarii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/555083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.555083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zarii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Millesime-Iris-84844.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84844.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Millésime Iris "title="Shalimar Millésime Iris "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/555083">Zarii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 08:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely, warm, comforting ambery scent. Smells similar to Serge Lutens Chergui to me but not so tobacco-y.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2035622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2035622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035310" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035310" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cogey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947978"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947978.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cogey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035310ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035310" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947978">Cogey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 01:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Halfeti has quickly become an insatiable craving for me. I wore it on NYE and the event I attended was outdoors, and I have to say, it is absolute PERFECTION for a cold night out on the town. The masterfully balanced cardamom and oud don’t disappear at all in the chilly night air, it has great projection and nice sillage. Every time I want to feel rich, fancy, like I bathe in gold flakes just because I CAN, I put this on. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2035310"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2035310#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033212" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033212" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="treez.are"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/32104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="treez.are" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Illicit-Green-71193.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71193.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Illicit Green"title="Black Opium Illicit Green"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033212ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033212" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/32104">treez.are</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 21:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a dupe sample for testing cos I am vary of oud often going wrong on my skin if it isn't well made. It was interesting at first. I got soicy cedar wood and it smelt good in the air like some deodorant smell that lingers on clothes. Minty, powdery and woody for a few hours. Then after hours it smelt of cheap and generic ittar from middle East. I hate this smell, really down market. There is no freshness or poshness but rather smells very middle eastern and not in a good way. Feels like a walking biryani if you know what I mean, meat marinated in spices and topped with fried onions and onion oil. Enough said. Bye bye oud and never meet me again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2033212"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2033212#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2031603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I was on holiday in turkey and the smell of the pine trees reminded me of this fragrance. <br />
I wore it to work and got told it smelt like cheap aftershave. I think it's the piney aspect of it that may remind some of brut or something green and pine like especially for those not into fragrances ( like the person that made the comment)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2026651" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Torky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1953330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Torky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2026651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2026651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1953330">Torky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-10">01/10/24 11:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spice, wood, leather and some rose. Gorgeous scent but also loud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2026651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2026651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024035" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cookygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cookygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Miracle-184.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.184.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miracle"title="Miracle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574">cookygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 22:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can appreciate leather and woody notes, and rose is a love for me.<br />
However, I don't enjoy spicy fragrances and this is a spice bomb to my nose.<br />
I do think this is meticulously crafted: while the spice predominates, it is tempered by the leather and rose. I also get the tonka quite clearly in the dry down. The oud is there too but it's nowhere's near overwhelming.<br />
There are many facets here but I just don't enjoy that spiciness. <br />
Moreover, as a woman, this fragrance is far too masculine for me to wear comfortably.<br />
Truth be told I don't think I would enjoy this on my husband either. I prefer cooler fragrances on him too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2024035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2024035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023145" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cashmereclaw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945680"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1945680.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cashmereclaw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023145ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023145" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945680">cashmereclaw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 01:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like burying your face in your fathers tired coat, hoping it would shield you from the wind or maybe even your mothers temper. Really exudes the same unfamiliar warmth - so, I smiled as I first smelt it. Layering it with a tobacco base could make it more personal, and I thought the scent would stick for the day; which wasn't the case unfortunately. More of a car or bag perfume, one for special occasions?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2023145"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2023145#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022459" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OloraGolosina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1786512.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OloraGolosina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786512">OloraGolosina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 09:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was extremely lucky to get a 30ml bottle at £40.00 on Penhaligon's website, I had this perfume on my wish list for over a year, but I did not want to spend £95.00 for 30ml, I like it very much, but I don't love it, the promo price has ended and it went up to £110.00 for 30ml.  I would never buy it again unless I can get it at a super bargain price like I did this time.  In terms of the aroma, I feel it has a lot of spices, but the main scent I get is wood, different types of wood, there is something herbal in it, like pine tree leaves, the rose is very tamed, in the background but it is present.  To me it smells like Bollywood; in other words, extravagant, colourful, fun, joyful, different, mesmerising, perhaps a dash of sexy.  I would use it only on special occasions, I truly believe, it would be a waste to wear it at work, firstly because it would be like having a Quetzal in a cage and second, I can guarantee that a lot of people would hate this perfume. It's an ok++ for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2022459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2022459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017657" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Staysmellinggood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1755838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1755838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Staysmellinggood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1755838">Staysmellinggood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the most well balanced fragrances I've smelled. I am the gourmand queen, so I usually layer it with more vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2017657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2017657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="2003311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=2003311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; the seperate notes are nice, especially what i get from the cooldown. but together its all just too much, unbearable</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1998358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1998358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Oud usually smells like gasoline to me, and leather is extremely harsh to me, but wow, this is so gorgeous and well blended! I can’t wait to mix this with some sweet florals for a sexier, more feminine twist.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1988156"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1988156#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983902" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ignacio88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554299"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1554299.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ignacio88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Sunrise-On-The-Red-Sand-Dunes-79102.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79102.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sunrise On The Red Sand Dunes"title="Sunrise On The Red Sand Dunes"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554299">Ignacio88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-24">11/24/23 01:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Es una fragancia de gran calidad, a mi novia le encanta. La he estado usando en mis vacaciones en el norte de California, en el día tenemos una temperatura de unos 17 grados Celsius en las noches unos 12 grados. Una breve historia: visite un viñedo en Kenwood y cuando entramos mi novia estuvo hablando con el personal en el mostrador viendo lo que ofrecían mientras yo estuve dando vueltas por la tienda y la chica que hablaba con mi novia de repente de detuvo y dijo wow, algo huele realmente bien aquí! Y mi novia le dijo quizás soy yo y la chica se acercó y la olió y le dijo tú hueles bien pero no, hay algo más y me acerque y deje que me oliera y quedó impresionada, este era el olor que estaba buscando, saco un papel y lápiz y me pregunto el nombre de la fragancia para poder buscarla. Así de buena es. Con una estela y duración 10/10. En mi ropa dura más de 12 horas y en la piel más de 8 horas.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1983902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1983902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1981353" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mae.si"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644242"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1644242.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mae.si" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Fortis-23084.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23084.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fortis"title="Fortis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1981353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1981353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644242">mae.si</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 18:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There’s absolutely no doubt that this is a high quality perfume, but unfortunately, it’s not for me. I love spicy scents, and leather scents, but something about this is headache inducing and for some reason, extremely boozy to my nose. I love Penhaligon's as a house, so I'm sad this is a miss for me. <br />
<br />
This also has a much longer lasting power than 85% of Penhaligon's other scents, which is great if it works for you~!<br />
<br />
At least the little mini bottle is cute, so although I won’t be wearing it, I’ll happily display it on my shelf. ^^</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1981353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1981353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1976442" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1976442" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scents from the horn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455651"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1455651.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scents from the horn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti"title="Halfeti"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1976442ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1976442" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455651">Scents from the horn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-14">11/14/23 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a well blended, woody aromatic, fresh enough to wear in warmer weather and woody enough to pull off in winter. slight hints of sweetness and a fresher Oud. Longevity is not the best for this price point but the scent is just beautiful. Perhaps for a more mature nose, this may not appeal to people who are newer to fragrances. Happy to add to my collection, rather pricey try purchasing it on trips to Europe if you go there, I ended up getting it at London Heathrow duty free and it's a significant cost saving vs. purchasing in Canada or the U.S.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1976442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1976442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1975078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1975078" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Apotheosis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Apotheosis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1975078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1975078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782562">Apotheosis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-12">11/12/23 14:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Halfeti eau de perfume, a fragrant homage to a beguiling Turkish hamlet where the roses are as darkly crimson as a raven's plumage, elegantly unfurls its olfactory narrative. Picture enchanting petals flourishing along the Euphrates, evoking a time when opulent silks, aromatic spices,  and luscious leathers exchanged hands amidst empires.<br />
<br />
In this scented tapestry of mystery and allure, it is the dance between rose and leather that steals the limelight. Exotic spices join the symphony, adding a tantalising touch of intrigue to the composition.<br />
<br />
But hush, speak of it in hushed tones, for here lies a revelation - originally crafted for the fairer sex! Yes, the floral and spicy notes were orchestrated to enchant the feminine olfactory senses. However, who dares confine such exotic delights to western imposed societal expectations related to gender? A mere whiff of Halfeti conjures visions of adventures, far-flung journeys, and cross-cultural dalliances.  The prominence of rose and leather,  heightened by the allure of exotic spices, beckons all, irrespective of gender.<br />
<br />
Behold, a meticulously crafted masterpiece, a multifaceted, multidimensional, and multilinear olfactory journey. One might expect nothing less from the artistry of Christian Provenzano, the maestro behind this fragrance. Reflecting on the aromatic journey, one can't help but ponder the whims of fate that nearly kept this olfactory gem concealed. It seems almost incredulous that, in years past, the scent wafted into my senses, yet failed to elicit the appreciation it so richly deserved. Oh, the irony that I, for some unfathomable reason, overlooked the allure of Halfeti! Now, in the present moment, as the fragrance graces my senses anew, I find myself questioning how such a treasure could have eluded me. It's a testament to the subtleties of taste and the evolution of one's olfactory palate – a lesson learned in the pursuit of sartorial elegance in fragrance.<br />
<br />
While Halfeti undeniably stands as a masterpiece, its elevated price warrants consideration. The allure of exclusivity, however, shouldn't limit olfactory indulgence. If a well-crafted duplicate capturing Halfeti's essence crosses your path, seize the opportunity. True refinement in fragrance should be a shared delight, accessible to all discerning noses.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1975078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1975078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1971471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1971471" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="officialzoki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1520922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="officialzoki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1971471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1971471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520922">officialzoki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-08">11/08/23 01:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tend to reach for Halfeti in the warmer months of the year as there’s a little more projection with the warm spicy notes. <br />
<br />
I love how the top, middle, and base notes fight each other as it creates a true masterpiece. <br />
<br />
However, I wish the performance was stronger as this fragrance turns into a skin scent after 4 hours (with 8 to 12 sprays).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1971471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1971471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1970743" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1970743" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="John Mallen Adair"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829095"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1829095.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="John Mallen Adair" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clive-Christian/Timeless-77140.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77140.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Timeless"title="Timeless"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1970743ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1970743" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829095">John Mallen Adair</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-07">11/07/23 06:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me it's half oud wood half OG lidge</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1970743"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1970743#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1970468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1970468" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="POTFORTY2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="POTFORTY2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1970468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1970468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657706">POTFORTY2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-06">11/06/23 20:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have smelled a lot of different niche fragrances and it’s getting pretty rare for something to impress me by offering something unique and pleasing. Halfeti is one of those few. I have smelled nothing like it and it is a very pleasant scent. It has the fall Christmas vibe but doesn’t blend together with other scents from that genre. It smells like a cologne where other fall scents smell more like a candle to me.<br />
<br />
It is a fresh pine sitting on top of a rose and oud. It kind of smells like licorice in its boldness and depth while having a fresh woody rose and green scent. Hard to describe. When I first sprayed my decant on a test strip I smiled before it reached my nose.<br />
<br />
Other scents from a similar genre I have are Initio Rehab and Herod this one dominates both in just what I enjoy subjectively. It’s better at evoking that seasonal vibe for me and has a more addictive profile. It’s honestly a 10/10. <br />
<br />
Performance wise it sticks around forever on me. I am talking 10 hours easy. It projects well. It is versatile I can easily see this dressed up or down though it’s more suited for fall and winter and I’d imagine the boldness would make it sickening in the heat.<br />
<br />
I love this stuff.<br />
<br />
Edit to add: this stuff is definitely in the same arena as Gucci Intense Oud and Black Afgano. I’m surprised more people don’t point this out as it’s very obvious they’re in a similar vein. I’d say this is the spicy more ‘Christmas’ version of that profile and if you like those this is an easy blind buy though you could find it redundant if you own GIO or Black Afgano.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1970468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1970468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1970356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
