padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812263">ryantramus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-06">11/06/23 17:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>James Bond breaks into a desert palace, steals a thumb drive, saves the world, and steals the sultan's prettiest wife. He was wearing this as he drives away in an original land cruiser through the desert dunes with a gorgeous woman and a pair of Sig P226 pistols.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1970356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1970356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1964108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1964108" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FilipeD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1781169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FilipeD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Kredo-74670.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74670.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kredo"title="Kredo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1964108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1964108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781169">FilipeD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-30">10/30/23 04:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely western interpretation of oud. Very wearable. <br />
If you like this scent, you should try  Dominique Ropion's "Oud Malaki" for Chopard.<br />
It's a better, more complex version and 3x stronger.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1964108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1964108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1958129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1958129" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nawaf.669"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nawaf.669" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1958129ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1958129" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813248">Nawaf.669</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-22">10/22/23 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Easily you can blind buy this fragrance for sure <br />
Scent 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1958129"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1958129#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949847" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ba2siK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374448.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ba2siK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949847ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949847" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374448">Ba2siK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-12">10/12/23 02:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of Maison Margiela Jazz Club in the opening, than a lighter version of black afgano</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1949847"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1949847#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949353" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hesssa21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1861309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hesssa21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861309">Hesssa21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Completely different to what I anticipated. It's fresh, nutty, spicy, woody. I don't smell any oud in this perfume though so if like me, that's what you were most excited for in this fragrance, prepare to be disappointed. I also don't really smell any rose unless i really look for it. <br />
<br />
I heard someone say that this reminds them of the smell of an expensive hotel room/shampoo or conditioner that they give you in a nice hotel and since then I can't view this perfume the same way again. It's a pleasant fragrance but I would never wear it on it's own as I grew tired of it quite quickly. To me, it's both unique and uninteresting at the same time. Just becomes lack-lustre after a while I suppose despite it being different to anything I've smelled before. <br />
<br />
Halfeti leather is much better and less boring if you still want that halfeti dna and frankly, I much prefer it to halfeti.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1949353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1949353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949282" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Definitely.Zella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Definitely.Zella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Midnight-Special-45957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Special"title="Midnight Special"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949282ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949282" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795992">Definitely.Zella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just received my sample, and I'm quite disappointed - I can hardly smell this. I get a warm and vaguely figgy note for about an hour, then the show's over.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1949282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1949282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946740" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MKnocker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583026"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1583026.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MKnocker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-Cologne-51692.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51692.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus Cologne"title="Aventus Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946740ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946740" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583026">MKnocker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 19:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Shocked to not see Carlisle in the Reminds Me of section. This opens a little lighter than Carlisle but dries down to being very similar. It’s a beautiful fragrance and a rare Penhaligon that actually performs well. I would say this is close enough to Carlisle to be redundant and doesn’t perform quite as well. But if you like a lighter opening you may want this instead. <br />
<br />
Definitely a fall and winter fragrance. I would not wear this in hot weather. Borderline office safe. Spray light if you want to try it there. It’s heavy and a little cloying. <br />
<br />
Bravo Penhaligon for finally delivering a perfume that performs. The first half dozen I’ve sampled were all decents scents ruined by shit performance. Hopefully there’s a few more gems out there from this house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1946740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1946740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1940053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1940053" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arifyusof92"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812163"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1812163.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arifyusof92" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althaïr"title="Althaïr"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1940053ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1940053" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812163">Arifyusof92</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-29">09/29/23 04:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud and Cedar is one of my Favorite woody notes. I manage to buy the Decant. Such a complex smell of scent. Now i understand Halfeti gets to be number one favorite among the Penhaligon's line up. <br />
Wait for few minutes or hours and you'll smell the Leather in it! As a Leather scent lover i really appreciate and admire this type of perfume. It's hard to layer these type of perfume as the perfume itself is already complex with a lot of mix of ingredient. <br />
<br />
Scent - 10<br />
Longevity - 9<br />
Silage - 9<br />
Projection - 10<br />
Compliment Factor - 10<br />
Blind buy - Yes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1940053"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1940053#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1938817" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927948" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Eau-de-Rochas-2361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Rochas"title="Eau de Rochas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927948ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927948" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923">COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-14">09/14/23 13:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yikes this is fantastic.  It reminds me of Chris Collin's Harlem Nights (I think)...or Chris Collins' Long Kiss Goodnight... I will have to smell those again.  But I think the rose subdues the similar notes of the previously mentioned scents. This is definitely on the masculine side but more feminine-friendly.  I love this rosey, leather concoction.  Theres a random note that plays peekaboo with my nose- maybe it's the saffron?  Whatever it is I adore it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1927948"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1927948#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927243" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927243" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charles Vane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1269625.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charles Vane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927243ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927243" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269625">Charles Vane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-13">09/13/23 16:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get refreshing sandalwood with rose. Light, soft oud in the background.<br />
<br />
There is something very evocative and transportive about this fragrance. <br />
<br />
I feel like there is a cloud of peace that hovers above me when I wear this. <br />
<br />
This may be the best scent I've ever smelled. <br />
<br />
I sometimes put one spray on my neck before bedtime so I may sleep in paradise.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1927243"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1927243#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919784" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1919784" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Xeryus-861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Xeryus"title="Xeryus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1919784ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1919784" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716">Glyph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-04">09/04/23 18:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rose is not the strongest note in this mixture, but it blends so beautifully with the penetrating notes of both leather and oud and the tangy note of saffron that it's definitely the note that pulls all this together. Normally I might find this kind of fragrance too much (I am usually not a fan of heavy oud), but the addition of tonka and vanilla (in extremely small amounts) smooths all this out somehow, although the overall roundness probably is more of a concession to Western European and American tastes than those of Asia Minor, which this claims by its very name to evoke. (The name refers to the legendary black roses of the Turkish village of Halfeti, and this is indeed a very dark rose accord.)<br />
<br />
This lasts longer than most Penhaligon's fragrances, and is a good choice if you want to try the note of oud but usually find it too harsh and pungent (as I do), and too reminiscent of the smell of Band-Aids.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1919784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1919784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1911986" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1911986" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Soul perfumer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1822696"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1822696.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Soul perfumer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1911986ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1911986" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1822696">Soul perfumer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-26">08/26/23 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the master creation from house of Penholigons.somehow i dont like it. i have full bottle and want to sell please dm if someone is interested,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1911986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1911986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1906924" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Evamomma"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/610902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.610902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Evamomma" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1906924ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1906924" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/610902">Evamomma</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-20">08/20/23 09:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A few years ago, I purchased this but, at the time, I had just purchased Santal 33 and they both filled the same “woody fragrance” space in my collection. I sold it on EBay a few days later. After decluttering Santal 33 to a close friend, I revisited Halfeti. Having worn it and enjoying it for the last couple days, I don’t know what I was thinking. This fills the woody fragrance space beautifully. It is so classy and inoffensive. No one around me wears it so I feel a teeny bit special smelling. I am so glad to know that it comes with many body products to accompany it. I don’t want to speak too soon but it could be signature worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1906924"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1906924#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1897310" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1897310" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Myrtillajus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Myrtillajus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1897310ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1897310" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368">Myrtillajus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-08">08/08/23 16:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Rose of Halfeti: the only one that is naturally black, which according to popular traditions absorbs the wickedness of the world, so much so that, as it blossoms, it appears dark red, then, as it matures, it darkens more and more until it becomes precisely black.<br />
This is a mysterious fragrance, a very successful amalgam of notes, with a rare beauty: worn, in my opinion, it gives elegance and sobriety, while making itself absolutely noticeable.<br />
Green notes and woods prevail on my nose, so that it appears round but pungent at the same time, a bit like this wonderful rose.<br />
Jannis Kounellis "Black Rose"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1897310"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1897310#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1895756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1895756" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chancellor7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chancellor7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1895756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1895756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379046">chancellor7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-06">08/06/23 15:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Niceee. As expected, Halfeti starts off with Penhaligons signature strong and pure barbershop notes. That always assures you that its a quality made, light texture and non-sticky juice. Nothing is light about the scent though. Halfeti is heavy on the spice giving off an aromatic scent, minty too. It smells more like an oil for the skin or for the home than a perfume, because it’s so unique. It’s not neatly &amp; affordably packaged like Spicebomb. But that makes it a great choice as a niche perfume. The woods and leather base give a rugged feel as if you’ve grazed/rubbed yourself against pure woods and leathers. It’s not an Oud bomb like Dior Ispahan, but the oud is there in a classy, feminine way. Altogether it’s Very sophisticated, rich and classy, smells like the entrance of Harrods. Since it’s inspired by the Turkish trade routes, and Penhaligons is acknowledged by the British royal family, I can imagine a successful trader like Al Fayed wearing this or his office smelling like this. Like most penhaligons scents, it’s so traditional in how it projects, powerful and packs a punch like an aftershave. So I recommend that you layer this with a clean/fresh designer scent, to give it a much more youthful and mass appealing twist. Smells exactly like Chopard Oud Malaki and Blazing Mr Sam. I’ve had both. Mr Sam is maybe 5% more mass appealing and smoother/lighter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1895756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1895756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1895679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1895679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Doc Radio L Ogiste"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Doc Radio L Ogiste" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1895679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1895679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282540">Doc Radio L Ogiste</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-06">08/06/23 13:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am pushing 50, and this is just a little too mature a scent for me. Don't get me wrong, it's a nice good quality scent. I would even call it timeless rather than dated. But you need to be really experienced, preferably retired, to really live up to the smell of Halfeti. Maybe when I'm older...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1895679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1895679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891491" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mvkenny70"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341813"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341813.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mvkenny70" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eternal-Oud-78155.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78155.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eternal Oud"title="Eternal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891491ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891491" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341813">mvkenny70</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 21:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy this fragrance. I'm waiting to test The Blazing Mr. Sam before I decide on which full bottle to purchase. This is probably my most liked fragrance DNA. Halfeti does remind me of a MFK Grand Soir with amped up spices and cedar. This is a 9/10 for me. Soft enough to have a refined elegance but strong enough to catch attention.<br />
<br />
I eventually decided to sell my bottle, because it leaned a bit too feminine on me and reminded me more of a candle scent than something I wanted to smell like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1891491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1891491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells like grandma.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1882082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1882082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881217" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881217" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Seuni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1266523.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Seuni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881217ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881217" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266523">Seuni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-18">07/18/23 03:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow. It's so hard to find a 100% masculine soap with 0% grandpa. The rose and saffron together make a red glassy/acidic candy and the cypress with the spices and woods bring some both green, and earthy tones. It's hard to describe as the composition is so well blended it's one of those fragrances that you shouldn't analyze as it feels finished, it feels full, you know what I mean?<br />
<br />
@edit - I was testing 4 fragrances at the time, all samples bought at an official distributor perfumerie and Halfeti is the only one I can barely detect after 3 hours - so not a fake, and not nosebleed as the others stand tall</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1881217"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1881217#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881075" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Whateverwhocares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Whateverwhocares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881075ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881075" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007">Whateverwhocares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-17">07/17/23 20:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Regal, earthy cypress and wood. Smells like something Indiana Jones would wear. The Sultan of Istanbul would dig this. Smooth blend. Harmonious. An acquired taste but feels familiar. A close second to Halfeti Leather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1881075"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1881075#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1877441" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="h149"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1210940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="h149" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1877441ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1877441" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210940">h149</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 21:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First experience with Penhaligon. This is the one I decided to skin test based on the strip.<br />
<br />
Lovely mysterious cypress. High fantasy, deep browns and greens, Pan’s Labyrinth, Hogwarts, fandom nerds compiling “dark academia” moodboards. I’m not into the oud as I’m never into oud in anything really, it always ends up trampling over the rest of the fragrance and takes on a synthetic, makeup-like smell to me. But the opening is very fresh and compelling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1877441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1877441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Beautiful and timeless, one of those fragrances that transports me to another place, and it lasts forever on my skin. <br />
<br />
Used to wear it a lot when my mum was recovering from a heart surgery and I think it helped her on the process. She loved it as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1847128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1847128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1845680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1845680" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bdlurtz52"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bdlurtz52" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Simone-Andreoli/Leisure-in-Paradise-61927.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61927.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Leisure in Paradise"title="Leisure in Paradise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1845680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1845680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748146">Bdlurtz52</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-31">05/31/23 04:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Tonka and oud blends to create an awe-inspiring scent with a hint of amber and lavender.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1845680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1845680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1844290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1844290" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NarcissisticSlowpoke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496866"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496866.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NarcissisticSlowpoke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1844290ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1844290" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496866">NarcissisticSlowpoke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-29">05/29/23 08:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought this when I'm on the Dubai's airport pretty much I'm in love with this one no denying, it's subtle but along the times it getting strong and stronger. I don't know if this is because the compatibility with my body or not.<br />
<br />
The leathers the smoothness of sweet tangarine-mandarine are there and complimented by the tiny bit of oud (Check out the Elixir if you wanted the oudy one) the only problem is I think performance wise this is not that good for the warm humid tropical environments where I live in, so just get indoors or just spray this frags when you're went dating but remember just go date in the mall or somewhere indoors and not 28°<br />
<br />
<br />
The only things I regret was I don't buy the cedars and blazing sam too.<br />
<br />
Overall 8/10<br />
pros:<br />
All around its good<br />
<br />
cons:<br />
It would be nice if this is get a bit cheaper</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1844290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1844290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1833768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1833768" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FirstSense"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323175"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1323175.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FirstSense" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1833768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1833768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323175">FirstSense</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-15">05/15/23 13:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tested this one from a lovely Penhaligon sample set. It reminds me of the Chopard Malaki line, especially Black Incense Malaki. That one is a beast that projects enormously. This Halfeti is much more sophisticated and smells more elegant and natural. To my nose this is a spicy Oriental with some pleasant flowers and fruits. So far Constantinopel is my favourite from this line but I have a few to go for testing. Really like the old world traveling  concept. Great graphic design and presentation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1833768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1833768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1830778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1830778" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1830778ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1830778" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-11">05/11/23 15:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Olfactory masterpiece, uniquely and well blended so it is difficult to pick out any one note. Gorgeous cedar with beautiful spices and hints of grapefruit. Wintertime scent, unisex. Lasts 90 minutes max on my skin but I don’t mind reapplying as I have a good supply.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1830778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1830778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290353">TheWoodman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-02">05/02/23 02:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one lasts, you can sometimes forget but then get a real blast from it. In my experience, a compliment garner but i have come across 2 dupes that i truly cannot tell the difference with. The essence vault number 186 and noted aromas. Personally i like it but i can see why some would say it’s too masculine. Well worth having in your collection and actually layers well with ombré leather.  I did not do this on purpose but by accident and yet, it worked a treat</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1822835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1822835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1737592">search4signature</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 01:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favourite fragrance of all time! A delicate and subtle rose emerges from a zesty and fresh opening, drying down into a deep and rich oud and vanilla with the rose subtly lingering. It lasts forever on my skin and can smell on my jacket for days after. Sillage continues all day and bursts of scent are released with small movements. Truly amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1819716"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1819716#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818343" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
