<br />
Great perfumery but not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1812352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1812352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1811837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1811837" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GooseneckG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730718"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="GooseneckG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1811837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1811837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730718">GooseneckG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-18">04/18/23 11:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Almost the most complete fragrance in my eyes. The only thing that lets it down is its projection especially for the price. But, still one of the most wonderful fragrances I have ever come across.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1811837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1811837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1805916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1805916" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iamwntr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445999"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445999.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iamwntr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1805916ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1805916" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445999">iamwntr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-11">04/11/23 03:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Best fragrance ever made in my honest opinion, yeah they copied Chopard with their Oud Malaki (they did it first) but Halfeti is so beautifully blended and more aromatic. If you've never smelled it and are curious, walk past a Penhaligon's shop, you'll smell it in the air straight away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1805916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1805916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1802831" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1802831" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lihsinhsu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273388"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lihsinhsu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1802831ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1802831" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273388">lihsinhsu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-07">04/07/23 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I usually really dislike oud perfumes, but this one is an exception. I think the cypress lifts the oud and makes it lighter and more practical for daily wear. I am impressed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1802831"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1802831#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1801783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1801783" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1801783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1801783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-06">04/06/23 01:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smooth leathery sweet oud😍🫦<br />
<br />
OMG the BEST unisex fragrance ever. I love how sensual this scent makes me feel- it feels like slowly waking up in the morning's twilight underneath silk bedsheets as the warmth of the light kisses your skin🌄✨️Definitely a scent I would wear either to work, or to shake the sheets! <br />
Ver👏sa👏ti👏li👏ty<br />
<br />
I love how the scent just joins with the skin. The fact that the herbal/resinous headnotes allows the sweet wood base notes to flourish...mindblowing🤩 The sillage is moderate to strong, and the longevity is there. I am probably going to invest in a full bottle👀. and I would also say this could be an amazing signature scent for those who enjoy light white musk oud fragrances.<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
⬆️Saggitarius ☀️Taurus 🌜Libra</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1801783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1801783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1800135" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1800135" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Made by Kouros"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1395030.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Made by Kouros" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1800135ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1800135" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395030">Made by Kouros</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-04">04/04/23 05:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been testing the "three reminds me of's" side by side on skin for three days to see if Montale Oud Dream or Chopard Oud Malaki could replace the mighty - and mighty expensive - Halfeti. <br />
<br />
OPENING:<br />
Halfeti opens as - a fresh cypress scent! Gorgeous cypress with other things in supporting role. More of a Mediterranean scent than oriental at first.<br />
Oud Dream opens extremely spicy. Is it cardamon, cinnamon? Then there's leather, wood, oud, glue... It's all a bit dirty and sweet and dank and quite glorious. Not nearly as fresh and woodsy as Halfeti.<br />
Oud Malaki opens spicy as well, but a bit fresher. It's the middle ground. There's a cashmeran molecule smell here that makes this lean mainstream.<br />
<br />
1-2 H LATER:<br />
<br />
Halfeti still has a natural woodsy breeziness to it: the rose, nutmeg, jasmine I presume kicking in with the cypress still going strong?<br />
Oud Dream is a dirty sweet mess, like a drunk hottie with tattoos and a cigarette. Dark and pungent. <br />
Oud Malaki has a unique and very pleasant freshness to it - that is until that tobacco shines through. Where's the freshness coming from? Love it.<br />
<br />
SOME 5 H LATER:<br />
Only now does Halfeti start to reveal its oriental nature with oud and leather and sandalwood. Halfeti is the most morphing composition. <br />
Oud Dream starts to smell like ass. For decency I won't continue with the previous analogy. There's also manure and a deep-fried Mars bar. This is the strongest, most linear of all and the most divisive.<br />
Oud Malaki is Tobacco Malaki. It's a fabulous sweet brown cigar leaf scent with a rum raisin feel. Sadly at this point it's too sweet for my dry taste. This has the least oud to my nose. Also maybe slightly weaker in performance from Halfeti too.<br />
<br />
VERDICT:<br />
For my personal taste, these are good but can't beat Halfeti. Runner-up was Oud Malaki, which I found fantastic until it gets too sweet for my taste personally.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1800135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1800135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799451" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1799451" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Katchke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Katchke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rose-Eau-De-Parfum-71661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"title="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1799451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1799451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595035">Katchke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-03">04/03/23 11:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful perfume, but so extremely not for me. Much too spicy with notes of tobacco/patchouli/incense made me feel like I was in the back of a taxi cab. Totally a unisex fragrance in my opinion. Pretty decent sillage, but almost headache-inducingly strong right after applied. Softens down into something quite warm and sweet by hour 5-6. Not a personal fan of this fragrance type but I think I understand the hype a little. No chemical tones, and incredibly long lasting on clothes!! Almost survived a hot shower.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1799451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1799451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1798782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1798782" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fazh97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fazh97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1798782ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1798782" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274841">Fazh97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-02">04/02/23 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a pleasant but weird scent. Opening has a lot going on with warm saffron, woodiness, and a white floral sweetness. This adds up to a well blended, quirky but sophisticated scent. It smells exotic and high end. The saffron is the main player here. Although oud is listed it's more clean woods in the base. As it dries it becomes increasingly sweet.<br />
<br />
My only issue with this is its too weird and although its pleasant I don't know in which circumstances I would want to smell like this. I'm glad I tried and there's nothing offensive about this,  but it's not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1798782"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1798782#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1797373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1797373" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpsottak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1460598.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpsottak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1797373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1797373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598">cpsottak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-31">03/31/23 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent of a TRUE executive gentleman. <br />
<br />
This has garnered me a lot of compliments in only a couple months of owning. Literally every time i wear it someone compliments me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1797373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1797373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1787320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1787320" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tshahb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579649"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1579649.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tshahb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Tobacco-Honey-84518.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84518.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Honey"title="Tobacco Honey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1787320ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1787320" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579649">Tshahb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-19">03/19/23 08:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For all of the notes listed, Chopard's Oud Malaki is identical and waaaaay cheaper. This is not to say that Halfeti isn't a good fragrance, but why bother when you can get the same excellent scent, performance and quality for a fraction of the cost? 🤷</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1787320"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1787320#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1784934" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1784934" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MyFragranticaUsername"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708117"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MyFragranticaUsername" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1784934ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1784934" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); It’s warm, rich, and a little musky. It almost smells like Le Labo Tonka 25, but less experimental and more mainstream.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1784934"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1784934#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1783193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399918">Kizzyb93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-24">02/24/23 09:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update : as my collection has grown I have found myself neglecting this regrettably <br />
As I was sorting out my frag wardrobe I found this right at the back of the top shelf, I instantly sprayed it and it instantly brought a smile to my face , it’s stronger that I remember I feel it’s got more leathery as it has been collecting dust for some time, I don’t think I could ever remove this from my collection it’s so so precious to me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1768274"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1768274#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1767716" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1767716" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aaronmy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1530551"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aaronmy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Day-Three/Escandalo-94878.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94878.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escándalo"title="Escándalo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1767716ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1767716" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1530551">aaronmy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-23">02/23/23 16:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance smells awesome. There's a fragrance by Arabian Oud called Desert Falcon Luxury Edition that this one reminds me of. They're both generally the same, but this has a more linear smell, while Desert Falcon LE turns ambery and sweet in the dry-down. This fragrance performs quite well and get's me through a day. And to describe the way it smells is that it would be a woody and spicy oud that goes into a tobacco vibe instead of leather. It doesn't smell barnyard-ish at all to my nose, but I get this dirty vibe from it. It is really awesome.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1767716"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1767716#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1766118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1766118" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lukasssss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lukasssss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1766118ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1766118" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657553">Lukasssss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-22">02/22/23 00:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing fragrance. So classy and elegant.<br />
Instantly reminded me of The Blazing Mr. Sam. They share a lot of similarities, especially the opening cardamom note.<br />
The jasmine and cedar combo also slightly reminded me of another Penhaligon´s fragrance: The Inimitable William Penhaligon.<br />
However, this is a fragrance of its own. It has a wonderful spicy, citrusy, and aromatic opening. The oud rose combo is very clean. It also has something that I would describe as a buttery quality. 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1766118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1766118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1753266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1753266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aquamarina29"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259843"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aquamarina29" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1753266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1753266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259843">Aquamarina29</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-06">02/06/23 06:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A bit too masculine to me to be considered unisex (in a true sense of a fragrance category, everyone can obviously wear whatever they like and whatever they feel comfortable wearing). The scent itself is gorgeous, the wood and leather being the most prominent notes beautifully balanced by the rose. Oud gives it a bit of oriental vibe but not too much. The vanilla gives it a delicious sweetnes. It’s elegant and I am imagining a man in a suit wearing this. However, considering  the price point, the projection and longevity is intimate and not only on me but I can’t also smell it on other people after a couple of hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1753266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1753266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1750456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1750456" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="er1cah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260580"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="er1cah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Fire-At-Will-70289.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70289.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fire At Will"title="Fire At Will"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1750456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1750456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260580">er1cah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-03">02/03/23 01:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would go as far as saying that this is my favorite perfume. Out of all perfumes I've sniffed. Ever. To me it is primarily a rose-oud scent, but because it has some earthy notes, it becomes more unisex and multi-dimensional than some other "oud + something sweet and feminine" recipe scents on the market. Some might think it's more date night / special occasion, but I think every day should be a celebration so I could easily make this a signature scent! &lt;3 Just don't overspray especially for the office cos this baby both lasts and projects.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1750456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1750456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Definitely a scent pour Homme for me. For some reason it reminds me of the trip I took to UAE.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1749375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1749375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1747669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love the spice to Halfeti, I was actually craving this today when I got ready for work. It's mature, spicy and woody w/o being unpleasant. This is one that I'll be keeping around for a very long time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1747669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1747669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1738325" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1738325" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpsottak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1460598.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpsottak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1738325ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1738325" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598">cpsottak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-19">01/19/23 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fills a niche in my collection like no other fragrance. A rose oud I actually like, blended by Christian Provenzano; this fragrance checks all the boxes for me. <br />
It doesn’t even smell like a rose oud, i can hardly pick out the notes aside from “some spicy wood?”. I think it smells so luxurious, not overly powdery, not too sweet, not too strong; so well blended, and the quality at the price point really sets this apart from the crowd.<br />
I burned through my sample and bought a bottle asap. I’d rock this all year long, day or night, dressed up or down</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1738325"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1738325#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1737121" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664252">Neverapeoplepleaser</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-18">01/18/23 08:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ah Helfeti. Where to begin. I was lusting after this fragrance for a long time. I received as a Christmas gift...and I've discovered there are other Penhaligons I much prefer. I appreciate the spicy, deep, incensey, darkness of Helfeti because I love those kinds of perfumes. But it is quite unrefined! I don't think it's particularly sophisticated. I love that it's long lasting unlike alot of Penhaligons and both my husband and I wear it but I wouldn't repurchase. Id rather save myself alot of cash and buy Ck Obsession! I much prefer Cairo, Babylon and Constantinople from the Trade Routes collection. I also have Legacy of Petra and would HIGHLY recommend that if you like a dark spice with lots of liquorice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1737121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1737121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1734807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Iv never smelt something so perfect. Immaculate, divine, expensive but worth every penny, I can’t get enough of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1734807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1734807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1730122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
