padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537817">Heinrich_B</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-10">01/10/23 05:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can see it being unisex! It is the unisexiest fragrance that I ever felt, being right in the middle for both sexes.<br />
But the smell itself it is very similar to a car odor, and again is similar to the cheap arabic fragrances availbale everywhere, at least in my country.<br />
<br />
So...a pass for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1730122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1730122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1726350" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1726350" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jagjag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1205929.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jagjag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Eau-Sauvage-Parfum-14811.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14811.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Sauvage Parfum"title="Eau Sauvage Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1726350ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1726350" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205929">Jagjag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-05">01/05/23 19:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a fairly unique fragrance. I would call this a thick fragrance. It has decent longevity on my skin. Fragrance profile stays fairly constant throughout the day as it reaches the dry down state quite quickly. Basically, you know what you will be smelling like for the whole day very quickly. <br />
<br />
Somehow, this fragrance does not give me nose blindness, so I can smell it all the way. Something I like. Those who like the heavier Amouage fragrances would likely enjoy this. <br />
<br />
As this is a heavier fragrance, I would not recommend this for bedtime use. (Yes, I do use a thin fragrance for bedtime after showering,  usually Brut Classic or Old Spice Original). I like to smell nice for my wife.<br />
<br />
Ok, for office use if used lightly. Great for dinner parties and formal events.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1726350"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1726350#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1720375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1720375" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mark0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/705222"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.705222.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mark0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1720375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1720375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/705222">Mark0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-29">12/29/22 17:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stay well clear If I was you. I bought this in 2018 and because it's running low I bought a few bottles of 2021 10ml travel sprays to save my main bottle and in comparison it's absolutely shocking. <br />
<br />
The travel sprays have the batch code 2031, which indicates it was bottle Jan 2021. Honestly, leave the modern version way alone.<br />
<br />
I sprayed the back of my hand 5 times and it lasted about 30 minutes and even then it was really tame. Again a fragrance has been watered down. This happens way too often for my liking. <br />
<br />
Newer version has the same scent profile but nowhere near the same staying power and didn't really project off the back of my hand either, nothing like my 2018 bottle. <br />
<br />
This offering isn't worth the money. In my opinion there are better Rose, Oud and leather fragrances out there that are much cheaper.  Really not happy what they've done to this. <br />
<br />
I wouldn't even say it's worth buying travel sprays to even smell it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1720375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1720375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1718971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1718971" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drakelito"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264945"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1264945.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="drakelito" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1718971ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1718971" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264945">drakelito</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-28">12/28/22 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A really nice fragrance, niche with designer likeability</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1718971"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1718971#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1712874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1712874" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GrenadeGirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633901"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1633901.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GrenadeGirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floraiku/Spring-River-96555.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96555.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spring River"title="Spring River"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1712874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1712874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633901">GrenadeGirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-19">12/19/22 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an amazing fragrance, incredibly well blended, but you can pick out so many of the notes.<br />
<br />
I have to admit the opening spray has a bit of 'air du toothpaste', but it is very short lived, and it dries down to this wonderful woody, citrusy smell that you will find you just have to keep sniffing.<br />
<br />
I have tried several of the Penhaligon's scents with mixed success, but this one is a clear winner for me!<br />
<br />
Several hours later: I just need to add an update to this - as much as I do like it in small doses, apparently I can't sit with it for long periods. For some reason, my inner me keeps telling me to take it off, so there is evidently something a little out of balance there for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1712874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1712874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1710902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1710902" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xokisha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1467757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1467757.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xokisha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Good-Girl-Blush-78576.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78576.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Good Girl Blush"title="Good Girl Blush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1710902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1710902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1467757">xokisha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-16">12/16/22 18:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m wearing this today and it’s absolutely stunning! I paired it with Rose from Bath&amp;Body works. Smelling good starts in the shower so I used my dove rose body wash &amp; Treehut rose scrub before applying my lotion n fragrance… let me tell you …. THIS COMBINATION IS EVERYTHING!! The fragrance is beautiful, she lasts &amp; she projects. I’m an oversprayer for sure but with this one I did about 11 sprays (one spray both sides of neck, back of neck, inner elbows, wrists, back of knees, and ankles). I walked outside, the breeze blew, and all I could smell was the luxurious Halfeti. This is a well blended woody/amber Fragrance but DO NOT blind buy this. Please get your nose on a sample first. First impressions when I got my sample in the summer was “eh it’s okay”.. but I tried it again recently in winter and immediately ordered a full size bottle as a xmas gift to myself. I love this one and I don’t leave many reviews.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1710902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1710902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1710353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1710353" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gundodona"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592500"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1592500.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gundodona" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lorenzo-Pazzaglia/Carbonara-69654.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69654.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carbonara"title="Carbonara"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1710353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1710353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592500">Gundodona</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-16">12/16/22 01:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely stunning fragrance and the first which took me into the niche world back in 2019. Back then Penhaligons was in duty free in the UK and the odd shop here and there. Now , they're everywhere! And for a niche house to have their own shops all over the UK isn't easy. And the scent that took the weight on it shoulders and was suggested and sold by 9/10 of their store reps was this little beauty! <br />
<br />
So if you're unsure how good it is, how unisex it is, how unique it is, that's enough in my opinion to show just how big a name Penhaligons has become, mainly due to Halfeti. <br />
<br />
I wore this on my wedding day and will always hold a place in my heart. It is absolutely stunning and at £200 a bottle you won't come across many people wearing this. More in the last few years certainly, but still not a Sauvage by any means <br />
<br />
Ive always found this particular fragrance hard to describe notes wise, because when I smell it personally I just smell a feeling rather than notes and as pathetic and ridiculous as it may sounds it has always in my mind smelt like what I'd imagine the palace in Aladdin to smell like 😅 .. beautiful, oriental, Arabic notes! <br />
<br />
I'd 100% recommend everyone try it, especially with most department stores now selling it, might not want to buy it, but with it being so easily accessible in the UK, don't spray this on a card and sample this. Spray it on yourself, crease of the elbow is always best, less likely to pick up other smells. Give it 5/10 minutes and I promise you, you'll be sniffing every few moments, stunning!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1710353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1710353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1702105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1702105" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mizur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mizur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Sensual-40563.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40563.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensual"title="Sensual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1702105ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1702105" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389">mizur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-04">12/04/22 15:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best oriental inspired perfumes I have ever smelled!!<br />
<br />
I sort of copied my own review from I am Trash - Les Fleurs du Déchet from Etat Libre d'Orange, since it almost has the same olfactory profile sans the oriental part.<br />
<br />
Let’s start with the good in this one… it’s an incredibly crafted oriental woody/ambery/fruity/musk scent.<br />
<br />
It’s also as amazing as it is straightforward… the Bergamot and Grapefruit join in with the Rose to create an amazing fruity sweet scent which is intoxicatingly well rounded with the Amber and Musk accords, it’s also woody from the Cedar and Sandalwood, spicy from the Oud, and deliciously enveloped in Vanilla.<br />
<br />
Truly a magnificent oriental!!<br />
<br />
Now, let’s get to the bad… performance is really poor, and it’s a shame.<br />
<br />
All Penhaligon’s perfumes that I own, which are quite a few, have the same lousy performance, and obviously Halfeti is no exception.<br />
<br />
Projection is moderate for the first thirty to forty five minutes and then it becomes intimate for about two more hours, finally fading into a skin scent for the rest of its lifetime which is about 7 hours.<br />
<br />
It can be worn at any time and in any season, but requieres constant reapplying if you actually want to be smelled by others.<br />
<br />
It leans a bit manly, but there is no reason women couldn’t wear it and smell amazing.<br />
<br />
A delicious powdery oriental perfume, with bad performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1702105"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1702105#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1701983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1701983" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="talkaboutscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1079076.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="talkaboutscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1701983ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1701983" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076">talkaboutscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-04">12/04/22 11:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@rizasman TO MAKE IT CLEAR<br />
Halfeti rose is just a marketing gimmick of this perfume. It is even doubtful if it has "any" reasonable rose oil here - if at all. Most likely the most common rose synthetics used (some of which found in nature in the natural rose flower or its otto/oil).<br />
<br />
And to update my old review...<br />
It is 100% safe to assume that there is no natural oud in this (and almost all commercial fragrances unless you buy something from specialists like Ensar Oud etc.) but rather an interpretation of oud that is completely up to the perfumer's understanding, and here it's used with the style of Dominique Ropion's favorite accord that he made his signature after repeatedly using first in Costume National Homme (2009) then in Chopard - Oud Malaki,  Boucheron - Oud de Carthage and recently Nishane - Papilefiko, as far as I could find.<br />
<br />
With that said, Cashmeran, Iso E Super, Cypriol oil (what passed on to consumers as oud note), patchouli oil, some camphorous ingredients (cypress, fir, rosemary etc.), a hefty dose of modern woody-amber molecules like Amber Xtreme (perhaps in combination of Trisamber, Ambrocenide, Norlimbanol), a hefty dose of sandalwood molecules (could be Bacdanol and Javanol), cardamom seed oil, cinnamals and eugenol (cinnamon and clove notes) and touch of lactonic molecules are what makes the body of this signature Ropion accord. Out of all created by this signature accord, I like Halfeti and Oud de Carthage the most. If you want to spend less, just try Chopard - Oud Malaki as prices dropped for that drastically, or Rasasi - Satoor Waaw and perhaps Korloff Private Silver...<br />
<br />
The recent comments striked me as they mention poor performance, which lead me to think a reformulation and toning down might have happened. My Halfeti bottles from 2016-2018 timeframe are quite strong, and on skin I get easy 12+ hours longevity and need to mention the nature of the ingredients tend to tire your nose easily so one has to be very careful in testing before mentioning performance issues. I always suggest to spray on someone you spend time a lot with no perfume on you instead of smelling on yourself to judge better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1701983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1701983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1701518" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1701518" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pashaagirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330384"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330384.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pashaagirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1701518ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1701518" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330384">pashaagirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-03">12/03/22 16:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a Sampler today. It smells kinda familiar. I've smelled this before when I was a child and it Was not Halfeti, cause I'm a 80's child. It is a good composition but still not my alley.  there's smth in it that makes me wanna throw up. Beast Mode, i washed my wrist severim Times but i still can smell it unfortunately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1701518"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1701518#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697163" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1697163" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1697163ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1697163" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); Most definitely a unisex perfume. I'm not sure why this is marketed for women!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1697163"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1697163#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1695946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1695946" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sniffathon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sniffathon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1695946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1695946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164">Sniffathon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-25">11/25/22 15:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous exotic fragrance and I can see the hype! It is rich, luxe and warm. Perfectly unisex, perfectly blended and interesting to wear without being challenging. The saffron is not overbearing which I was a little worried about. The florals perfectly complement without turning into a floral perfume. Just enough herbal-ness and fresh spice. Oud-y, Leather-y rosy perfection that lasts a long time. Love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1695946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1695946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1693339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1686160" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tobaksskab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1601566"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1601566.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tobaksskab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1686160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1686160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1601566">tobaksskab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-11">11/11/22 11:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like generic man's cologne. Brings to mind a man in his 50-60s with brilliantined hair, clean shaven, wearing a heavy suit. The price for the quality of the scent is through the roof -too expensive for what you get. I don't hate it, but I am not a fan either. Could be a good blind buy if you're gifting to an old school, older, manly man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1686160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1686160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1684846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267736">meama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-09">11/09/22 15:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A oud note designed for the people who like Aventus<br />
A western type of synthetic oud with safran and a lot of screeching synthetic musc. Smells like something already done (and better done) ten times by other brands. Anyway it's OK ...exept if like for me synthetic woody amber notes are the worst possible thing utilised in perfumery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1684846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1684846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1684556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1684556" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Markus.Shears"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391343"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1391343.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Markus.Shears" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Tropical-Wood-35972.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35972.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tropical Wood"title="Tropical Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1684556ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1684556" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391343">Markus.Shears</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-09">11/09/22 07:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My girlfriend love this scent, can be very strong if you spray a lot and this scent is also easy to go nose blind to if you spray a lot.<br />
<br />
<br />
Side story, choose to take this fragrance with me to Cancun as my daily frag. Was in the heat every day beaming down on me in the pool and got compliments. But two ladies from London before the end of my trip swam up to me at the pool bar and said they always knew when I arrived and was in the pool by my smell and absolutely adored the scent. Don't be afraid to spray your scents guys and don't be afraid to try certain scents in the heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1684556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1684556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1674422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1674422" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentfrommanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1421277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentfrommanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kylie-Cosmetics/Cosmic-Kylie-Jenner-90957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cosmic Kylie Jenner"title="Cosmic Kylie Jenner"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1674422ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1674422" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1421277">Scentfrommanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-26">10/26/22 04:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Saw this mentioned a lot on TikTok and was very intrigued so got a sample.  also, it’s by Christian Provenzano who created Agent Provocateur’s original perfume that I adore.  <br />
<br />
It’s beautiful, such an all round beautifully blended smell and the sandalwood gives it an amazing creaminess.  It also feels very comforting, but…<br />
<br />
The silage and longevity don’t seem to be there for me, maybe it’s the citruses.  Probably projects for about an hour or so and then becomes a skin scent on me, although perhaps I go nose blind to it?<br />
<br />
It’s a stunning perfume, just a teensy bit too masculine for me, and I’m pretty sure no-one else can smell it on me as my mum usually comments on most of the fragrances I try but not this one.<br />
<br />
Well worth a sniff because it’s so talked about in the fragrance world, and I feel it will become such a classic perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1674422"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1674422#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1671850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1671850" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mazzablair"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1574961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mazzablair" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1671850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1671850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1574961">mazzablair</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-22">10/22/22 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the scents which I simply am not able to pick apart the notes/accords. To my nose it has it all - citrus, floral, nutty, wood, oud, musk, amber, EVERYTHING; but balanced very well. Definitely not a fragrance I would wear every day, but certainly a great fragrance that would work well for special occasions. Would definitely recommend sampling this before buying as it's one of the fragrances that has smelled quite different to how I was expecting it to based on reviews from here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />

It's different than Cairo (rose-oud) in the sense that it doesn't have any sweetness, because the leather/wood tones down the oud. I actually don't get the traditional middle eastern jammy oud here, it's more like dry wood shavings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1655034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1655034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1649669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A few hours at most. It’s so classy and elegant in the most refined way. I am 30yr  old female and when I wear this it screams old money ( with the right outfit Ofcourse). I am soo happy to have this in my collection, it ticks all the boxes and just blends with my body chemistry perfectly. It’s addicting I just want to keep smelling this more and more, I bought the body lotion to go with it! This is popular for a reason, like most popular fragrances you cannot deny the pull that it has over so many. This is absolutely unisex, I was a bit noseblind to the fragrance initially but I am working at training my nose to smell it more and more. The lasting power is great, I could smell it on my shirt for days afterwards. This is a masterpiece in my humble opinion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1647520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1647520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1636311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Cedar was out of stock at harrods so I got the OG. Turns out I bought a monster. Sprayed on at 8 am and it’s still going strong at 8 pm. Initially the scent is strong on the cypress with the rose coming in but by the end of the day is a rose and oud combo. I have been getting wafts from it all day and love it. Disappointed I didn’t try this way earlier. This has achieved everything I wanted and more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1636311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1636311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1631030" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CR95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516766"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516766.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CR95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Twilly-d-Hermes-Eau-Ginger-67667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Twilly d'Hermès Eau Ginger"title="Twilly d'Hermès Eau Ginger"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1631030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1631030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516766">CR95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-25">08/25/22 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tobacco and masculine energy hits first, VERY strong. Kind of a Shalimar type but... if I had to choose I'd take Shalimar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1631030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1631030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1626141" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1626141" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="QuentinsBeach"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1546186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="QuentinsBeach" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1626141ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1626141" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1546186">QuentinsBeach</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-18">08/18/22 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find this incredibly pleasant and on the sweet side (not overly) - EDIT: sweet like a rosé wine - thus when you account for the wide range of notes you have to also say very thoroughly blended. IE, sure not as far sweet as something like Side Effect, but sweeter than a great many. Easy to wear. Masterfully composed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1626141"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1626141#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1618764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1618764" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Serghei Avdonin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522925"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Serghei Avdonin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Fleur-Narcotique-Extrait-de-Parfum-75061.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75061.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur Narcotique Extrait de Parfum"title="Fleur Narcotique Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1618764ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1618764" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522925">Serghei Avdonin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-07">08/07/22 07:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From the first try I can smell strong rose, but underneath it you can find sweet notes, woody notes and flowers.<br />
Everyone in my family loves this one, it's not boring, very modern and floral fresh.<br />
Bestseller from the house of Penhaligon's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1618764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1618764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1610514" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1610514" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jajakapitan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jajakapitan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1610514ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1610514" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151192">jajakapitan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-25">07/25/22 16:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A uniquely sophisticated unisex scent for lovers of woody and leathery goodness. It isn’t live at first spray for me, I find the opening notes hard to tolerate - it’s like smelling a box used to store an expensive scotch or whisky in. But give it 15 minutes and this perfume transforms into something else. It’s a fragrance that requires a quiet yet observant individual to wear it in my honest opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1610514"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1610514#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1610451" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472302">abbieclark67</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-25">07/25/22 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a complex scent! Halfeti is incredibly excellent. Along with oud, I detect hints of rose and spices until the scent settles to a sandalwood background. The mixture feels entirely organic. I can't wait to wear this every time, especially on the chilly Winter days, because it is just so exquisite and intricate. Yes, it is pricey, but I genuinely believe that it is worth every penny because the performance is top notch and the joy it offers is indescribably valuable. Adorable!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1610082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1610082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1604637" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
