Dark and cedar woody with a hint of leather, but it needs a lot of sprays to stay with me and not as powerful as I expected.<br />
Definitely a unisex scent for Autumn or Winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1604637"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1604637#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1603483" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1603483" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glassfury"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1519213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1519213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glassfury" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nicolai-Parfumeur-Createur/Fig-Tea-2037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fig Tea"title="Fig Tea"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1603483ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1603483" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1519213">Glassfury</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-15">07/15/22 05:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had heard so much hype about this! But having procured a sample, I'm underwhelmed. It's powerful and lovely on first sprit, with a woody leatheriness, and more masculine tending than I was expecting. <br />
<br />
It's not.. unpleasant, but the dry down on my skin makes me think of those scratch and sniff books I used to see as a child, this weird synthetic, gooey note that's unidentifiable. I don't get any rose at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1603483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1603483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1600330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1600330" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thebewitchingyasmine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1483975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1483975.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thebewitchingyasmine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1600330ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1600330" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1483975">thebewitchingyasmine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-10">07/10/22 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A petrol station in the peak of summer<br />
<br />
Wading through dried grass<br />
<br />
Narguilé<br />
<br />
Arabesk vinyl records</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1600330"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1600330#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1599816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1599816" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="artfulsmeller"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158294"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="artfulsmeller" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1599816ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1599816" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158294">artfulsmeller</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-09">07/09/22 13:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells just like a mixture of John Varvatos Dark Rebel and Maison Margiela Jazz Club. I think it is the artemisia, cardamom, and leather. I love both of these fragrances, but somehow Halfeti does not do it for me. Perhaps it just feels like the same thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1599816"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1599816#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1593915" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1593915" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.5564.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Miller-Harris/Lost-In-The-City-51611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lost In The City"title="Lost In The City"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1593915ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1593915" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5564">Tee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-29">06/29/22 19:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>warm spices, woods and a hint of rose... cardamom and nutmeg forward. leathery polished woods. with one or two rose petals scattered around. <br />
classic with a twist. very unisex for confident persons (or those needing extra confidence boost). <br />
i like it, i enjoy it. but not me enough for me to buy a big bottle. one of those small, cute bottle is enough for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1593915"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1593915#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1591433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1591433" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VETTIVAER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VETTIVAER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1591433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1591433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289">VETTIVAER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-25">06/25/22 18:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update: tried this again, but on skin this time. The opening is green and harsh. The dry down approaches the very generic modern synthetic rose oud scent that is popular everywhere in Paris. I don't smell the boquet of spices and florals that is apparent on a paper strip. <br />
<br />
This is an unpopular opinion but Halfeti is pretty unimpressive for such an expensive fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1591433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1591433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="31396" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent991400" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc991400" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bubbles1964"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1095199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1095199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bubbles1964" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bastide-Aix-en-Provence/Figue-Amour-48974.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48974.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Figue Amour"title="Figue Amour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma991400ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd991400" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1095199">Bubbles1964</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-15">10/15/18 07:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’ve had my decant for about a year and I wrote a review after I wore this one time, and soon after deleted my words. I was hesitant to form an opinion of such a complex scent after just one wearing.<br />
<br />
I put this on yesterday afternoon and I can still smell it, 16 hours after application. It’s not for the shy or faint of heart. <br />
<br />
I like oud based perfumes if they smell natural. I know the real stuff is typically out of reach price wise, so if an aroma chemical can come close I’m good. And Halfeti is very, very good. I pick up spices and rose along with oud, then it dries down to a sandalwood base. All the ingredients feel natural. <br />
<br />
Today I can confidentially give Halfeti the thumbs up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="991400"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=991400#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1431443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1431443" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BellaSmella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262375"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1262375.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BellaSmella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Pasticcio-75940.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75940.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pasticcio"title="Pasticcio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1431443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1431443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262375">BellaSmella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-20">10/20/21 10:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Be still, my beating AORTA!!! 😍😍😍<br />
One sniff of this and it’ll change your life like it did mine - honestly. 😍<br />
<br />
My wonderful husband treated me to a bottle of this after I fell in love with a sample of it last year. Man.. I don’t think I can return to my former cheaper, fruity florals now 😂.. this is just so beautiful, so complex and makes me excited to wear it every time, especially on those cold Autumn/Winter days. Yes, it is expensive but I honestly would say it’s worth every penny (my husband agrees 😆).. the performance is just next level and the happiness it brings.. priceless. <br />
<br />
Ladies, if you’re usually into softer sweeter fragrances, don’t be put off by the stronger notes as you’ll likely find it grows on you the more you sniff it, as I found myself. I’m growing to love it more every day (My husband loves it more and more too!)<br />
<br />
While this is unisex, I would personally recommend “The Blazing Mr Sam” to any guy who wants a slightly deeper and even more masculine version of this. My husband wears it and I absolutely adore it on him 😍<br />
<br />
What else can I say.. This has me absolutely hooked for life, especially for those cold Autumn months - it’s so wonderfully woodsy! It transports me to a beautiful forest in the day and then by a blazing bonfire with fire flies amidst at night. ❤️<br />
<br />
So to wrap up.. His and Hers Autumn scent recommendations:<br />
For the guys - The Blazing Mr Sam<br />
For the gals - Halfeti<br />
<br />
You won’t regret it. 😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1431443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1431443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent890880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc890880" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="weegee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11063"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11063.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="weegee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/La-Couche-du-Diable-55547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Couche du Diable"title="La Couche du Diable"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma890880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd890880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11063">weegee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-17">12/17/17 01:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cedar is one of my favorite woody notes and when amplified by a nice, chewy patch I like it even better.  Halfeti takes woods to a whole new level  with the addition of oud and cypress. Woody heaven!<br />
<br />
But lest you think Halfeti is just another walk in the forest, I'm here to tell you that a smooth amber resin, deep dark roses, fine, fine leather and, improbably, cardamom, cinnamon, tonka and vanilla (ALL of which my nose detects) shift Halfeti into a magical warm blend unlike anything else in my collection -- a woody spice.  Truly sublime.<br />
<br />
I went on a Penhaligon's binge last January and didn't give Halfeti enough attention in the following weeks, at least not enough to properly evaluate and appreciate her.  With the onset of cold weather this year I've come to know her better and give her my highest recommendation.<br />
<br />
Can't say how Halfeti works on male skin but she truly blossoms on mine. Not for lovers of light florals or candy-sweet fragrances but if you're looking for a woody, leather spice bomb that lasts for 6-8 hours and radiates comfort and warmth, Halfeti is for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="890880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=890880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1365381" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1365381" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blossomka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blossomka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1365381ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1365381" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912">blossomka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-24">06/24/21 14:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>8/10. Beautiful. Mild at first then opens up. Honey with delightful spices. A library with a skylight and old cedar chairs to sit down and read. I smell several different woody trees and a mossy forest at daybreak. It becomes astringent after 10 mins then moves toward greater sweetness. Equally good for a man or woman.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1365381"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1365381#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent904893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc904893" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="talkaboutscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1079076.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="talkaboutscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma904893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd904893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076">talkaboutscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-01-26">01/26/18 17:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing cedar, right amount of oud, and right amount of sweetness with nutmeg, tonka and cardamom to save it from being a burnt-oud stiffness. The fact that the rose is not prominent, is also a huge plus in my opinion.<br />
<br />
The scent did not change much after 1 hour, maybe lost projection a bit but it smells FAN-TAS-TIC. I must admit, this carries the DNA of Gucci Rush for Men, Pal Zileri Sartoriale, Azzaro Visit and Chopard Oud Malaki! Comparing the notes actually proves. Maybe it's a great blend of all. Amazing. Just amazing. I own all except Gucci Rush, so will definetely update my review after doing side by side comparison, and few mixing and layering trials.<br />
<br />
The longevity is 12+ hours, projection is quite far reaching as far as feedbacks from others, skin scent after 7-8 hours mark.<br />
<br />
I sprayed again last night around 11PM to my forearm just to feel good. This morning I woke up, started working at home, then got gentle whiffs of Comme des Garcons Wonderoud/wood..."When did I spray it ?" I asked myself. Well I did not of course. This was just Halfeti from last night, transformed into something that reminds me the drydown of Wonderoud/wood! Magical stuff, smooth cedar, sandalwood and oud leftovers, the smoothest milky woodsy feeling that I can relate to maybe Dyptique's Tam Dao.<br />
<br />
Now I am layering Halfeti by Gucci PH. Boosts masculinity to the top! And blends very well as I really think Halfeti as a more rounded, rich version of the that same genre. As a good alternative it can be layered by Bentley Absolute as well. Next I will try layering with Wonderoud! Really excited of this fragrance, Halfeti is by far the best unexpected discovery for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="904893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=904893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="31396" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1555108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1555108" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="derby2169"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1389884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="derby2169" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1899-Hemingway-18846.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18846.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1899 Hemingway"title="1899 Hemingway"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1555108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1555108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884">derby2169</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-02">05/02/22 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon's Halfeti, a fragrance apparently everybody loves, a classic of the woody oriental genre, and practically exactly what I dislike in the genre. While I am expecting to be immediately downvoted, I think a different perspective might be useful for some people.<br />
<br />
Essentially the moment you spray Halfeti you immediately get the entire package, what some would refer to 'linear perfumery', not necessarily bad, in fact some of my favorite scents are very linear. The issue is that this linearity is very poorly suited for Halfeti's make up, namely because at its core is a very aggressive woody musky ambery aromachemical, smells like a slightly off pastry, but also grainy and rough like rubbing alcohol. This material is clearly being used to allow for the monstrous 20 hr+ longevity.<br />
The result though is that any attempt at creating a radiant, transparent experience, one that would be palatable to the nose is ignored to produce intensity and projection. <br />
In fact I recently smelled this on a pharmacist, who was behind the booth and I was wearing a mask, and even asked him to confirm. Indeed Halfeti had crawled across the 2m distance, and through the mask fabric and right into my nose.<br />
<br />
Essentially spraying this on you feel like a truffle, some people love that feeling, knowing that walking around they are the most pungent and sharp object in the room. In my opinion there is a reason why we dilute truffel in oil or butter, to reduce it to an intensity that makes sense to our nose, to study the nuance of it.<br />
I am not claiming it smells terrible, or bad even, but rather it's structure and the effect it has on people around you is something you should consider before buying it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1555108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1555108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1007221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1007221" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oudaddict"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1058831"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1058831.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oudaddict" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Areej-Le-Dore/Russian-Musk-II-67896.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67896.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Russian Musk II"title="Russian Musk II"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1007221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1007221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1058831">Oudaddict</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-06">12/06/18 02:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Disappointed by this after trying it based on all of the hype. It gives me the impression of aniseed. It is a spicy oriental fragrance with a sweet touch to it and I don't much oud from it, rather, a medley of various spices, a bit of leather and rose. Longevity is average for me. Not something that I would buy a full bottle of.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1007221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1007221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1314722" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1314722" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tarax80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319537"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tarax80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1314722ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1314722" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319537">Tarax80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-27">03/27/21 00:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>would be perfect for a handsome man<br />
not for women, in my opinion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1314722"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1314722#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1201892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1201892" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GustaveTheNose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1015635.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GustaveTheNose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Gold-Man-918.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.918.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold Man"title="Gold Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1201892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1201892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015635">GustaveTheNose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-20">07/20/20 13:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have mixed feelings on this one, it smells amazing in the air, but doesnt feel that original or natural overall. <br />
<br />
Its a rose oud saffron combo, which has been done a million times. <br />
<br />
Im actually impressed with longevity, this thing lasts and lasts.<br />
<br />
A better option from the same house is Sohan, which actually has oud rather than the accord herein (as per the SA who works at Penhaligons). <br />
<br />
If you like halfeti, try Sohan. Thats all I can say.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1201892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1201892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509311" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VETTIVAER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VETTIVAER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289">VETTIVAER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-21">02/21/22 17:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Incredible scent. Sharp balsam, saffron and spices backed by oud wood and resins. <br />
<br />
If you are a fan of Jubilation XXV, you will enjoy this one. Take the soft spicy,  warm woody nature of Jubilation, add sharp balsam and subtract the sour musky blackberry, and you get Halfeti.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="31396"comment_id="1509311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html?ccid=1509311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="31396" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x250" id="fragranticacom_perfume_mrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
        
        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.30509.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Montale/Honey-Aoud-30509.html#cc2368250"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Montale</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Honey Aoud</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="This was one of the first Montale fragrances I tried and I immediately liked it. Along with it I tried Intense Cafe, Arabians Tonka, Ristretto Intense Cafe, Intense Pepper, etc. but this one was the one I liked the most. However, I ended up buying Arabians Tonka first because of its performance....">by
            <em>Animalitos1_</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69248.png"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
